Quick search

Code Documentation¶

This part of the documentation is here to document objects and methods used in the code. If your plan is only to use Zhudi, you shouldn’t need to look at that part.

Data Objects¶

class zhudi_data.Data(simp, trad, trans, wubi86, wubi86_short, array30, array30_short, cangjie5, cangjie5_short, pinyin, zhuyin=[])¶

Data contains all the data used by Zhudi.

simp : a list of simplified forms trad : a list of traditional forms trans : a list of translations wubi86 : a dictionary of wubi86 codes wubi86_short : a dictionary of short wubi86 codes array30 : a dictionary of array30 codes array30_short : a dictionary of short array30 codes cangjie5 : a dictionary of cangjie5 codes cangjie5_short : a dictionary of short cangjie5 codes pinyin : a list of pinyin zhuyin : a list of zhuyin (default = [])

Processing Tools¶

class zhudi_processing.PreProcessing¶

This class is in charge of the pre-processing needed to lauch Zhudi. It loads config files, split dictionaries, etc.

get_config()¶

Reads the config file, if it exists, and returns a list of variables related to that file (of the form [var, value]).

read_files(pinyin_file_name, zhuyin_file_name, traditional_file_name, simplified_file_name, translation_file_name)¶

Reads some files needed to build the Dictionary class. Returns 5 lists: (pinyin, zhuyin, traditional, simplified, translation)

split(dictname)¶

Loads the *.u8 file and split it. Return a tuple of 4 lists: (simplified_list, traditional_list, translation_list, pinyin_list)

class zhudi_processing.SegmentationTools¶

This class is intended to contains any functions dealing with Chinese. In other words, any functions treating a sentence, a word, etc.

Sets are aimed at speed performance.

load(dataObject)¶

Load and prepare needed data.

searchUnique(word, dataObject)¶

Search for a word in the dictionary. Returns only 1 result (the index) or None if nothing found.

sentence_segmentation(string)¶

Parse the string input for Chinese words based on words in our dictionary. Retuns a list of words.

class zhudi_processing.DictionaryTools¶

Contains all functions needed for the dictionary part.

pinyin_to_zhuyin(pinyin, dataObject)¶

Converts the given pinyin list into zhuyin. Returns a list.

search(given_list, text)¶

Search for a string in a list.

Arguments: given_list: a list of words text: a string

Searchs for “string” in “given_list”. Returns a list of indices in the index attribute of the DictionaryTools class.

unicode_pinyin(pin1yin1)¶

Convert a string representing a pinyin syllable with tone. Returns a string.

Argument:
A string like “ni3”.

Chinese input methods objects¶

class zhudi_chinese_table.ChineseTable(table_path)¶

Abstract class aimed at providing common methods for each tables.

load(file_name)¶

Read codes from a file, and return a dictionary of codes and a dictionary of short codes

proceed(character, dictionary)¶

Returns the key code of the character as a code and as displayed_faces.

class zhudi_chinese_table.Cangjie5Table¶

Contains the full cangjie5 input method information.

class zhudi_chinese_table.Array30Table¶

Contains the full Array30 input method information.

class zhudi_chinese_table.Wubi86Table¶

Contains the full Wubi86 input table information.
